channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bin lorry has damaged pavement again!, 9th August
item.description:
The bin lorry has damaged the pavement again outside my house, it was only fixed for the 5th time yesterday. Who ever is doing the repairs just scrapes off the tarmac and refills…. As per the last time it was damaged this needs properly fixing and firming up underneath. You are just wasting money at this point doing the same thing over and over.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Millham Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, 9th August
item.description:
It has had a white line painted round it a few months ago but nothing has happened. It’s on a bend in Brockhampton lane just past the GE aviation on the way to Brockhampton village.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Looks like two smashed windscreens., 9th August
item.description:
Dangerous broken glass on the inside of small lay-by on the left hand side of Brockhampton lane just after level crossing on the way up to Swindon Village. Looks like at least two windscreens.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General road marking and stud issues problem, 9th August
item.description:
Customer reports that vehicles are just parking in the electric car points and the vehicles are diesel and petrol. Which is stopping people with hybrids or electric cars from being able to charge their vehicles. Customer also reports that there are double yellow lines over one of the park spaces for the points, and is it okay for users of the power points to park over these lines when charging their vehicles. Are the old double yellow lines going to be removed, and new lining going to be put down to go around the parking space for the points?
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Rattling manhole after repair, 9th August
item.description:
The drain manhole cover is rattling and jumping after its recent repair Approx location: I’m sharing a what3words address to help you find this specific location. Tap to see exactly where it is: ///bronzed.bunny.thickened https://w3w.co/bronzed.bunny.thickened
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Road, Stoke Orchard
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 9th August
item.description:
Customer reports that trees at the location are overhanging the garden and causing an obstruction to pedestrians on the pavement. Please can Highways cut this back asap.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This is the 6th repair, 9th August
item.description:
So this gets repaired on a Thursday then delivery and bin Lorrie’s damage it by the Friday . It’s to soft. They are just tracing. Needs to be filled properly. There used to be grass there so it’s just collapsing and wasting money on repairs that get broken within 24hrs

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Millham Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 9th August
